name: cross solid quilt cover
description:
QUEEN SIZE

this beautiful cover has been hand printed in
bright mustard and steel grey in cross solid design,
using environmentally friendly water based inks.
the print meanders randomly across the bottom 
2/3 of the cover.

as each cover is printed in a freehand technique,
no two covers are the same.
the cotton is from italy and the cover is sewn in australia.

it is very easy to care for, just turn the cover inside out
to protect the print, and machine wash on a cold cycle.
warm iron if you must!

it is a very good quality cotton and is lovely to sleep in.

pillowcases are sold separately.

please contact michelle at quince on 03 9509 5508,
or info@quincehomewares.com.au to discuss ordering
different sizes

description:
FREE DELIVERY WITHIN AUSTRLIA

pendant shade

size of shade: 700MM D X 320MM H

base cloth: 100% linen biscuit
lining: 100% linen off white
ink colours: dove grey, charcoal and white

this shade has been handprinted by quince in cross stitch design, using environmentally friendly waterbased inks. it has also been lovingly handstitched  with mustard, charcoal and white threads on the smaller cross motifs.

description:
FREE DELIVERY WITHIN AUSTRALIA

printed in gunmetal and opaque white on to a grey wool felt and then hand stitched with a yellow thread. lovingly hand stitched
by quince.
lining white  linen

solid timber ball base, handcrafted from sustainably harvested 
vic ash, finished with danish oil
made by a local craftsman to our design specifications

size of shade 285mm d x 250mm h
total height 480mm

name: reverse dotty/hand drawn lines cushion
description:
these cushions are hand printed in burnt tangelo 
and white onto a 100% linen in stone, using 
environmentally friendly waterbased inks.
each cushion is different to the next.
one side is printed in revers dotty.
the other side is printed in hand drawn checks.
feather fill. invisible zip. machine washable.

size of cushion - 30cm x 50cm

tones of orange, two of green and a netural. each one 
is stitched slightly differently to the next.
stitched onto 100% linen in biscuit. 
front stitched only.
feather fill.
machine washable.

size of cushion 30cm x50cm

name: daisy with yolk bedlinen
description:
queen size quilt cover with self covered 
buttons across the bottom on the front
100% linen from italy
cover sewn in australia
this beautiful cover has been handprinted by quince 
in the freeform printing technique making no two covers the same. it has been printed in dove grey, pearl white, opaque white, gunmetal grey and yolk.
the cover is very simple to care for in that it can be machine washed on a cold cycle. warm iron if you must!
it is very beautiful to sleep in linen and makes for a good 
quality sleep.
pillowcases sold separately

do you need a king size cover? please call michelle on
03 9509 5508 or email info@quincehomewares.com.au
to discuss your needs

FREE DELIVERY WITHIN AUSTRALIA

name: gift voucher
description:
give this lovely handprinted card with handprinted and stitched envelope, so that your chosen recipient can purchase something that is just right.

valid for 6 months from date of issue.
 
we can post the voucher directly to your chosen recipient 
including your message.

alternatively, we can post it to you so that you can personalise
it further.

please email us with your preference, info@quincehomewares.com.au
